> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight shook her head in disbelief and followed the other Maximals

<NEW>

The room that NIGHTLIGHT and the others appear in is generally dark,
but from the little bit of light it was also very large. The room is
dominated by a large cylinder in the middle of the room that is about
fifteen feet in diameter and stretched from the floor all the way to a
ceiling that was perhaps 30 feet in the air. Energy was flowing
through the cylinder, a black sort of energy with yellow motes of
light floating about within it.

Around the room itself there are control panels and computer screens
along nearly the entire space of the wall. And it was light from the
cylinders plus light from the panels the provided the only
illumination in the chamber.

However in the time it took for everyone to examine the room everyone
began to feel a small stabbing pain in their processors. Whatever
energy that machine was giving ff, it was having an intensely
disruptive affect on all their systems.

SHARPEDGE, who was holding his head with a pained expression on his
face looked over at STAMPY and NIGHTLIGHT, "I hope one of you two know
how to get into these panels and shut this thing down."

(TAG)

- Preston
